fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Light Punch: Visit a player. Gain 1 Combo if you're the only visitor. Attack them if you have 3+ Combo.
- [__STOP AND DASH__]: Requires 1 Combo. Set a Yoyo at a player's house tonight. They will be informed. Starting tomorrow, at the end of each night, you will astrally attack one of their visitors randomly. Gain 1 Combo for each player when you kill a player with Stop and Dash. Only 1 Yoyo can exist at a time, and if you move it to a new house you will still need to wait a night before killing any visitors.
- [__ROLLING MOVEMENT__]: Requires 3 Combo. Dash towards your Yoyo, attacking the player whose house it is located at. Gain 1 Combo if you kill them.
- [__KICK START MY HEART__]: Requires 4 Combo. Choose a player. Anyone who visits you will instead visit them, and you will attack everyone you redirect and the second player.
- Overdrive (__LOOP THE LOOP__): Requires 5 Combo. Deal an Overkill attack to anyone.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill the other Fighter, then be the last one standing.
